item.title: STM32 SPI Driver Testing with Logic Analyzer
item.description: Intro This is a short post on how to use a Logic Analyzer to test an SPI driver implementation when not having another device to test with. I recently bought a Saleae Logic Analyzer and it comes with a very convenient protocol analyzer tool to test SPI, I2C, CAN and other protocols. Here is the web guide. I wanted to test this for myself so I updated and uploaded an old SPI driver I wrote for STM32F446.
